content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 3, Manchester City 2.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 3, Manchester City 2.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Goal!  Real Madrid 3, Manchester City 2. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marcelo.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Edin Dzeko (Manchester City).
Yaya Touré (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Xabi Alonso (Real Madrid).
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Karim Benzema.
Attempt missed. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Pablo Zabaleta with a cross.
Goal!  Real Madrid 2, Manchester City 2. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ángel Di María.
Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Manchester City 2. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Foul by Karim Benzema (Real Madrid).
Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Raphael Varane.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Raphael Varane.

Attempt missed. Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ángel Di María with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Matija Nastasic.
Attempt blocked. Mesut Özil (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ángel Di María with a cross.
Attempt missed. Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Carlos Tévez with a cross.
Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Manchester City 1. Marcelo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Ángel Di María.
Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Carlos Tévez.
Substitution, Manchester City. Pablo Zabaleta replaces Maicon.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Karim Benzema replaces Gonzalo Higuaín.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Luka Modric replaces Sami Khedira.
Attempt saved. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Carlos Tévez.
Attempt missed. Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) header from very close range is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Ángel Di María with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Aleksandar Kolarov.
Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Real Madrid 0, Manchester City 1. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Yaya Touré following a fast break.
Foul by Gaël Clichy (Manchester City).
Marcelo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Substitution, Real Madrid. Mesut Özil replaces Michael Essien.
